field.label: Option
field.help: Option to offer to the client.

field.label: Interface
field.help: This adds a single interface as tag so this DHCP option can match the interface of a DHCP range.

field.label: Tag
field.help: If the optional tags are given then this option is only sent when all the tags are matched. Can be optionally combined with an interface tag.

field.label: Value
field.help: Value (or values) to send to the client. The special address 0.0.0.0 is taken to mean "the address of the machine running dnsmasq"

field.label: Force
field.help: Always send the option, also when the client does not ask for it in the parameter request list.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
